statements: SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, face_value, currency FROM financial_instruments WHERE market_value IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT instrument_name, issuer_company, issue_date, maturity_date FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, issuer_company FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE face_value > 10000 AND market_value IS NULL;
SELECT instrument_name, issue_date, maturity_date FROM financial_instruments WHERE issuer_company LIKE '%Bank%' ORDER BY issue_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(face_value) AS avg_face_value, MAX(market_value) AS max_market_value FROM financial_instruments WHERE currency = 'EUR';
SELECT * FROM bonds;
SELECT bond_name, issuer FROM bonds WHERE maturity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bond_name, issuer, issue_date FROM bonds WHERE issuer = 'Company A';
SELECT bond_name, maturity_date FROM bonds ORDER BY maturity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM derivatives WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bonds WHERE issuer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY maturity_date DESC
SELECT bond_name, issue_date FROM bonds WHERE maturity_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bonds FROM bonds
SELECT * FROM derivatives WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' AND underlying_asset = 'Stocks' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_derivatives FROM derivatives WHERE expiration_date < '2023-06-30'
SELECT * FROM bonds ORDER BY issue_date DESC
SELECT product_name, issuance_date, principal_amount FROM structured_products
SELECT underlying_asset, expiration_date FROM derivatives
SELECT bond_id, issuer, maturity_date FROM bonds WHERE coupon_rate > 3.5
SELECT product_name, principal_amount FROM structured_products WHERE principal_amount >= 10000
SELECT * FROM bonds WHERE issuer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY maturity_date DESC;
SELECT bond_id, nominal_value, coupon_rate FROM bonds WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM derivatives WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT product_name, principal_amount FROM structured_products WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(asset_allocation, '$.stocks') IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM bonds JOIN derivatives ON bonds.issuer = derivatives.underlying_asset WHERE bonds.coupon_rate > 2 ORDER BY bonds.nominal_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM bond;
SELECT bond_name, issuer, maturity_date FROM bond;
SELECT derivative_id, instrument_type, underlying_asset, expiration_date FROM derivatives;
SELECT product_name, issuing_bank, maturity_term, principal_amount FROM structured_products;
SELECT assessment_id, instrument_id, assessment_date, risk_score FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT * FROM bond ORDER BY maturity_date DESC, coupon_rate ASC;
SELECT bond_name, issuer, face_value FROM bond WHERE face_value > 100000 ORDER BY face_value DESC;
SELECT instrument_type, underlying_asset, valuation FROM derivatives WHERE valuation BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT product_name, issuing_bank, maturity_term FROM structured_products WHERE maturity_term > 5 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT instrument_id, assessment_date, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score < 3 OR volatility IS NULL ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bonds;
SELECT bond_name, issuer_name, coupon_rate FROM bonds WHERE maturity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT issuer_name, bond_name FROM bonds ORDER BY bond_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, issue_date, maturity_date FROM structured_products WHERE maturity_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT valuation_id, valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM valuations ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT bond_name, coupon_rate, maturity_date FROM bonds ORDER BY maturity_date DESC, coupon_rate ASC
SELECT derivative_type, underlying_asset, expiration_date FROM derivatives WHERE contract_size > 1000 ORDER BY expiration_date
SELECT product_name, maturity_date, issuer_name FROM structured_products WHERE maturity_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT instrument_type, valuation_amount, valuation_date FROM valuations ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC
SELECT assessment_id, instrument_type, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE assessment_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY risk_score DESC
